record.title: MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2738 AND S. 2739
record.narrative:
MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2738 AND S. 2739 -- (Senate - March 11, 2008)

[Page: S1825]

speaking.paragraph: I understand there are two bills at the desk due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bills by title.
The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2738) to identify and remove criminal aliens incarcerated in correctional facilities in the United States and for other purposes.

A bill (S. 2739) to authorize certain programs and activities in the Department of the Interior, the Forest Service, and the Department of Energy, to implement further the Act approving the Covenant to Establish a Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands in Political Union with the United States of America, to amend the Compact of Free Association Amendments Act of 2003, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: I object to any further proceedings with respect to these bills en bloc.

record.chair: The bills will be placed on the calendar.
